text: The First Question Award (ザ・ファースト・クエスチョン・アワード) is the debut solo album by the Japanese recording artist Cornelius. It was released in 1994 and charted at number four on the Japanese Oricon album chart. The First Question Award includes the singles "The Sun Is My Enemy", "Perfect Rainbow", "(You Can't Always Get) What You Want" and "Moon Light Story". ==Track listing== All songs written, arranged and produced by Keigo Oyamada. ==Personnel== *Keigo Oyamada - Writing, Arrangements, Producer *Makimura Ken - Executive Producer ;Cornelius *Keigo Oyamada - Vocals, Guitar ===Cornelius Rock 'n' Roll Orchestral Circus=== *Toda Yoshié - Drums, Percussion *Mishima Toyoaki - Synthesizer *Kawai Daisuke - Keyboards (2, 4 to 6, 9 to 11) *Kume Daisaku - Keyboards (1, 3, 7) *Mecken - Bass (2, 5, 7, 9) *Watanabe Hitoshi - Bass (4, 6, 10, 11) *ASKA Strings - Strings (5, 7, 10, 11) *Nomiya Maki - Chorus (10) *Otomo Mami - Chorus (4) *Asa-chang - Percussion (4) *Kobayashi Masahiro - Trumpet (3, 5, 6, 8 to 11) *Araki Toshio - Trumpet (1, 7) *Fuchino Shigeo - Saxophone, Flute (5, 6) *Takeno Masakuni - Saxophone, Flute (5 to 7) *Yoshinaga Hisashi - Saxophone, Flute (6, 9) *Honda Masato - Saxophone (9) *Matsumoto Osamu - Trombone (5, 6, 8) *Yagi Nobuo - Harmonica (4) *Imanari Riki - Synthesizer Operation ===Technical and visual=== *Takayama Tohru - Mixing Engineer (1 to 4, 7, 8, 10, 11) *Hirose Osamu - Mixing Engineer (5, 9) *Mori Tatsuhiko - Mixing Engineer (6) *Yoshida Zin - Mixing Engineer (1) *Koizumi Yuka - Mastering Engineer *Katou Yoshiaki - Coordinator *Oko Ichiro - Recording Director *Okeda Ken-ichi - Director *Arakawa Yasunobu - Recording Jammer *Sakuragi Kei - A&R;
